snippet: Tom Lehman took the lead in the Charles Schwab Cup Championship and moved closer to becoming the first player to win the season points title two straight years.
abstract: Tom Lehman takes third-round lead over Fred Couples at Charles Schwab Cup Championship golf tournament in Scottsdale, Ariz.
lead_paragraph: Tom Lehman took the lead in the Charles Schwab Cup Championship and moved closer to becoming the first player to win the season points title two straight years.

headline.seo: Tom Lehman Leads Champions Tour Finale
headline.main: Tom Lehman Leads Champions Tour Finale
